original: śākyasiṃhastotram
analyzed: śākyasiṃhastotram

original: brahmaṇā kṛtam
analyzed: brahmaṇā kṛtam

original: namaḥ śākyendrāya |
analyzed: namaḥ śākya indrāya

original: namo'stu lokādhipa śākyarāja saddharmapaṅkeruhabhāskarāya |
analyzed: namaḥ astu loka adhipa śākya rāja saddharma paṅkeruha bhāskarāya

original: kleśārivargābhihatāya tubhyaṃ saṃbodhidīpairhatamohajāla || 1 ||
analyzed: kleśa ari varga abhihatāya tubhyam saṃbodhi dīpaiḥ hata moha jāla

original: brahmarṣirājarṣisurarṣisaṅghaiḥ prāptuṃ na yacchakyamanekaratnaiḥ |
analyzed: brahmarṣi rājarṣi surarṣi saṅghaiḥ prāptum na yat śakyam aneka ratnaiḥ

original: prāptaṃ tvayā jñānamanantadharmaṃ yenākariṣyaḥ sakalasya haityam || 2 ||
analyzed: prāptam tvayā jñānam ananta dharmam yena akariṣyaḥ sakalasya haityam

original: pravartitaṃ yena sudharmacakraṃ yasmin mahī sodadhiśailarājā |
analyzed: pravartitam yena sudharma cakram yasmin mahī sa udadhi śaila rājā

original: ānanditeva calitā hyajasraṃ namo'stu tubhyaṃ tribhavādhipāya || 3 ||
analyzed: ānanditā iva calitā hi ajasram namaḥ astu tubhyam tri bhava adhipāya

original: yasmiṃśca vātāstriguṇena yuktā vavurnabhasto nipatanti vastrāḥ(rṣāḥ) |
analyzed: yasmin ca vātāḥ triguṇena yuktāḥ vavuḥ nabhastaḥ nipatanti

original: vicitrapuṣpāṇi sugandhi vāri namo'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekanātha || 4 ||
analyzed: vicitra puṣpāṇi sugandhi vāri namaḥ astu tubhyam jagat eka nātha

original: ananyajeyo namucirvariṣṭhaiḥ sainyairvṛtaḥ koṭiśatapramāṇaiḥ |
analyzed: an anya jeyaḥ namuciḥ variṣṭhaiḥ sainyaiḥ vṛtaḥ koṭi śata pramāṇaiḥ

original: jitaṃ tvayaikena nirāyudhena namo'stu tubhyaṃ balavartanāya || 5 ||
analyzed: jitam tvayā ekena nirāyudhena namaḥ astu tubhyam bala vartanāya

original: yena trilokīṃ pratipālituṃ tanmāyāsukajjājvalayan(?) prajātam |
analyzed: yena trilokīm pratipālitum prajātam

original: svabhāvato janmajarāntakāriṇe namo'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekanātha || 6 ||
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ janma jarā anta kāriṇe namaḥ astu tubhyam jagat eka nātha

original: traidhātulokeṣu vikāsituṃ tāṃ saṃbodhicaryāmapavargasetum |
analyzed: traidhātu lokeṣu vikāsitum tām saṃbodhi caryām apavarga setum

original: tuṣitāyuto janma cakāra martye namo'stu tubhyaṃ varabodhirāja || 7 ||
analyzed: tuṣita ayutaḥ janma cakāra martye namaḥ ustu tubhyam vara bodhi rāja

original: samyak pratijñāṃ pratikṛtya yena saṃpreṣyate mokṣapure janaughaḥ |
analyzed: samyak pratijñām pratikṛtya yena saṃpreṣyate mokṣapure jana oghaḥ

original: tadarthamāyāsi ca martyaloke namo'stu tubhyaṃ sumahatpratijña || 8 ||
analyzed: tad artham āyāsi ca martya loke namaḥ astu tubhyam su mahā pratijña

original: yaścāṣṭakaṃ brahmakṛtaṃ supuṇyaṃ paṭhiṣyati śākyavarāgrataḥ sthaḥ |
analyzed: yaḥ ca aṣṭakam brahma kṛtam su puṇyam paṭhiṣyati śākya vara agratas sthaḥ

original: duḥkhaṃ mahāpāpabhayaṃ ca hitvā śrīśrīghane yāsyati pattane mudā || 9 ||
analyzed: duḥkham mahā pāpa bhayam ca hitvā śrīśrīghane yāsyati pattane mudā

original: brahmaṇā kṛtaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhastotraṃ samāptam |
analyzed: brahmaṇā kṛtam śrī śākyasiṃhastotram samāptam
